bug.author: UnknownObject000
bug.summary: [Bug] No embedded configuration 2stem found after pip installed
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/pull/450>#450</denchmark-link> Description I have installed spleeter using pip. When I running the spleeter command on powershell, the error poped up. <denchmark-h:h2>Step to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Installed using pip install spleeter Run as spleeter separate -i .\audio_example.mp3 -p spleeter:2stem -o .\ Got spleeter:No embedded configuration 2stem found error
<denchmark-h:h2>Output</denchmark-h>
PS F:\Spleeter\spleeter> spleeter separate -i .\audio_example.mp3 -p spleeter:2stem -o .\ ERROR:spleeter:No embedded configuration 2stem found <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
OS Windows 10 20H2
Installation type pip
RAM available 8.7GB
Hardware spec GPU GTX1050 / CPU Intel Core i7-8750H
<denchmark-h:h2>Additional context</denchmark-h>
Reinstall does not help.

comments.comment: More info: Python Version: 3.7.4 pip version: 20.1
The configuration is spleeter:2stems, not spleeter:2stem.
